bugundan.text: When the master is absent, the frogs hop into the house.
Where there is love there is no darkness.
A person who never travels, believes his mother's cooking is the best in the world.
A united family eats from the same plate.
Drums are never beat without reason.
Elderliness is not a disease, but a richness.
If you educate a woman, you have educated a population.
The one who loves an unsightly person is the one who makes him beautiful.
An ugly child of your own is more to you than a beautiful one belonging to your neighbor.
A strawberry blossom will not sweeten dry bread.
If you burn a house, can you conceal the smoke?
The talker will lead the dog to the meat market.
By trying often, the monkey learns to jump from the tree.
He who hunts two rats, catches none.
He who is bitten by a snake fears a lizard.
The heart of the wise man lies quiet like limpid water.
When the moon is not full, the stars shine more brightly.
